author: sethzenz
body:
From @sethzenz : optimize the VirtualJetProducer for H->gammagamma analysis when multiple vertex hypotheses are used, but many inputs are empty. 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11820 (original by @sethzenz).
title: Prevent VirtualJetProducer from wasting time on setup if input empty
